ViewObject.Name: RentalContractVO
ViewObject.SelectList: XxadsRentalContractEO.ACTIVE_FLAG, XxadsRentalContractEO.APPROVED_DATE, XxadsRentalContractEO.CONTRACT_DATE, XxadsRentalContractEO.CONTRACT_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.CONTRACT_NUMBER, XxadsRentalContractEO.CONTRACT_SOURCE, XxadsRentalContractEO.CONTRACT_STATUS, XxadsRentalContractEO.CONTRACT_TYPE, XxadsRentalContractEO.CREATED_BY, XxadsRentalContractEO.CREATION_DATE, XxadsRentalContractEO.CUST_SITE_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.CUSTOMER_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.CUSTOMER_STATUS, XxadsRentalContractEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE, XxadsRentalContractEO.DEPARTMENT_CODE, XxadsRentalContractEO.DEPARTMENT_NAME, XxadsRentalContractEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.DIV_FLEX_VAL_SET_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, XxadsRentalContractEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, XxadsRentalContractEO.MASTER_CONTRACT_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.MASTER_REFERENCE_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.NOTE, XxadsRentalContractEO.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, XxadsRentalContractEO.PARENT_CONTRACT_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.PARENT_REFERENCE_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.PAYMENT_TERM_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.PREPARED_BY, XxadsRentalContractEO.PROJECT_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.REFERENCE_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.REMARKS, XxadsRentalContractEO.REQ_BU_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.REVISED_BY, XxadsRentalContractEO.REVISED_ON, XxadsRentalContractEO.REVISION_NUMBER, XxadsRentalContractEO.REVISION_REASON, XxadsRentalContractEO.SCOPE_OF_WORK, XxadsRentalContractEO.SITE_USE_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_BU_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_DIV_FLEX_VAL_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_DIV_FLEX_VAL_SET_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_DIVISION, XxadsRentalContractEO.SUBMITTED_BY, XxadsRentalContractEO.SUBMITTED_DATE, XxadsRentalContractEO.TERMS_CONDITIONS, XxadsRentalContractEO.VALID_FROM, XxadsRentalContractEO.VALID_TO, (select inv.bu_name from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_BU_ID) AS TRANSSRCBU, (select nvl(sop.division_required,'N') from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_BU_ID) AS TransSrcDivRequired, (select SOP.DEPT_SEGMENT_NUM from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_BU_ID) AS TransSrcDeptSegmentNum, (select sop.segment_num from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_BU_ID) AS TRANSSRCDIVSEGMENTNUM, (select inv.currency_code from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_BU_ID) AS TRANSSRCCURRENCYCODE, (select xct.precision from xxfi_currencies_t xct, xxinv_business_units_t xbut where xbut.currency_code = xct.currency_code and xbut.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_BU_ID) AS TRANSSRCBUPRECISION, (select inv.bu_name from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.REQ_BU_ID) AS TRANSREQBU, (select sop.segment_num from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.REQ_BU_ID) AS TRANSREQDIVSEGMENTNUM, (select SOP.DEPT_SEGMENT_NUM from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.REQ_BU_ID) AS TRANSREQDEPTSEGMENTNUM, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_RENTAL_CONTRACT_SOURCE' and xlvt.lookup_code= XxadsRentalContractEO.CONTRACT_SOURCE and xlvt.application_id = 13) AS TRANSCONTRACTSOURCE, (case XxadsRentalContractEO.CONTRACT_SOURCE when 'Q' then (select quote_number from xxads_rental_quote_t where quotation_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.REFERENCE_ID) WHEN 'R' THEN (SELECT request_number from xxads_asset_request_t where request_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.REFERENCE_ID) else null end) AS TRANSREFERENCENO, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_CUSTOMER_TYPES' and xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE and xlvt.application_id = 13) AS TRANSCUSTOMERTYPE, (select xpj.project_number||' - '||xpj.project_name from xxpj_projects_t xpj where xpj.project_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.PROJECT_ID) AS TRANSPROJECT, (select fv.description from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID) AS TRANSDIVISION, (select fv.flex_value||' - '|| fv.description from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_ID) AS TRANSDEPARTMENT, (select xcdt.customer_name from xxfi_customer_details_t xcdt where xcdt.cust_account_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.CUSTOMER_ID) AS TRANSCUSTOMER, (SELECT xcsdt.bill_to_site||' - '||xcsdt.address from xxfi_customer_site_details_t xcsdt where xcsdt.site_use_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SITE_USE_ID) AS TRANSCUSTOMERSITE, (select name from xxra_terms_t where term_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.PAYMENT_TERM_ID) AS TRANSPAYMENTTERMS, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_RENTAL_CONTRACT_STATUS' and xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractEO.CONTRACT_STATUS and xlvt.application_id = 13) AS TRANSCONTRACTSTATUS, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_CUSTOMER_STATUS' and xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractEO.CUSTOMER_STATUS and xlvt.application_id = 13) AS TRANSCUSTOMERSTATUS, (select set_id from XXINV_BUSINESS_UNITS_T where bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.REQ_BU_ID) AS TRANSSETID, XxadsRentalContractEO.CONTACT_NUMBER, XxadsRentalContractEO.LPO, XxadsRentalContractEO.SALES_REP_ID, XxadsRentalContractEO.SITE_CONTACT_PERSON, (select party_name from XXFI_SALESPERSONS_T where resource_salesrep_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SALES_REP_ID) AS TRANSSALESPERSON, XxadsRentalContractEO.LINE_TYPE, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractEO.LINE_TYPE and xlvt.lookup_type = 'ORDER_LINE_TYPES') AS TRANS_LINE_TYPE, XxadsRentalContractEO.TAX_RATE_CODE, XxadsRentalContractEO.TAX_RATE_ID, (select PERCENTAGE_RATE from xxfi_tax_codes_t where trunc(sysdate) between trunc(effective_from) and nvl(trunc(effective_to),trunc(sysdate)) and tax_rate_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.TAX_RATE_ID) AS TRANS_TAX_RATE_PERCENT, (select fv.flex_value from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_DIV_FLEX_VAL_ID) AS TRANSDIVFLEXVALUE, XxadsRentalContractEO.ORDER_TYPE, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractEO.ORDER_TYPE and xlvt.lookup_type = 'ORDER_TYPES') AS TRANSORDERTYPE, XxadsRentalContractEO.LOCATION_CODE, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractEO.LOCATION_CODE and xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_LOCATION_SEGMENT_SET') AS TRANSLOCATION, XxadsRentalContractEO.SITE_LOCATION, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractEO.SITE_LOCATION and xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_SITE_LOCATIONS' AND xlvt.application_id = 13) AS TRANSSITELOCATION, XxadsRentalContractEO.CONTACT_EMAIL

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSrcBu
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select inv.bu_name from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSrcDivRequired
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sop.division_required,'N') from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSrcDeptSegmentNum
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select SOP.DEPT_SEGMENT_NUM from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSrcDivSegmentNum
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select sop.segment_num from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSrcCurrencyCode
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select inv.currency_code from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSrcBuPrecision
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xct.precision from xxfi_currencies_t xct, xxinv_business_units_t xbut where xbut.currency_code = xct.currency_code and xbut.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransReqBu
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select inv.bu_name from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.REQ_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransReqDivSegmentNum
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select sop.segment_num from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.REQ_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransReqDeptSegmentNum
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select SOP.DEPT_SEGMENT_NUM from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.REQ_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransContractSource
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_RENTAL_CONTRACT_SOURCE' and xlvt.lookup_code= XxadsRentalContractEO.CONTRACT_SOURCE and xlvt.application_id = 13)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransReferenceNo
ViewAttribute.Expression: (case XxadsRentalContractEO.CONTRACT_SOURCE when 'Q' then (select quote_number from xxads_rental_quote_t where quotation_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.REFERENCE_ID) WHEN 'R' THEN (SELECT request_number from xxads_asset_request_t where request_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.REFERENCE_ID) else null end)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCustomerType
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_CUSTOMER_TYPES' and xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE and xlvt.application_id = 13)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransProject
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xpj.project_number||' - '||xpj.project_name from xxpj_projects_t xpj where xpj.project_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.PROJECT_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransDivision
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select fv.description from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransDepartment
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select fv.flex_value||' - '|| fv.description from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCustomer
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xcdt.customer_name from xxfi_customer_details_t xcdt where xcdt.cust_account_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.CUSTOMER_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCustomerSite
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT xcsdt.bill_to_site||' - '||xcsdt.address from xxfi_customer_site_details_t xcsdt where xcsdt.site_use_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SITE_USE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransPaymentTerms
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select name from xxra_terms_t where term_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.PAYMENT_TERM_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransContractStatus
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_RENTAL_CONTRACT_STATUS' and xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractEO.CONTRACT_STATUS and xlvt.application_id = 13)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCustomerStatus
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_CUSTOMER_STATUS' and xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractEO.CUSTOMER_STATUS and xlvt.application_id = 13)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSetId
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select set_id from XXINV_BUSINESS_UNITS_T where bu_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.REQ_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTotalAmount
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: (RentalContractLinesVO1.getRowSet().sum('LineValue != null ? LineValue : 0') == null ? 0 : RentalContractLinesVO1.getRowSet().sum('LineValue != null ? LineValue : 0'))+(RentalContractChargesVO1.getRowSet().sum('Amount!= null ? Amount : 0') == null ? 0 : RentalContractChargesVO1.getRowSet().sum('Amount!= null ? Amount : 0'))+(RentalContractLinesVO1.getRowSet().sum('VatTaxAmount != null ? VatTaxAmount : 0') == null ? 0 : RentalContractLinesVO1.getRowSet().sum('VatTaxAmount != null ? VatTaxAmount : 0'))+(RentalContractChargesVO1.getRowSet().sum('VatTaxAmount!= null ? VatTaxAmount : 0') == null ? 0 : RentalContractChargesVO1.getRowSet().sum('VatTaxAmount!= null ? VatTaxAmount : 0'))

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSalesPerson
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select party_name from XXFI_SALESPERSONS_T where resource_salesrep_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SALES_REP_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransLineType
ViewAttribute.Expression: select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractEO.LINE_TYPE and xlvt.lookup_type = 'ORDER_LINE_TYPES'

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTaxRatePercent
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select PERCENTAGE_RATE from xxfi_tax_codes_t where trunc(sysdate) between trunc(effective_from) and nvl(trunc(effective_to),trunc(sysdate)) and tax_rate_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.TAX_RATE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransDivFlexValue
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select fv.flex_value from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = XxadsRentalContractEO.SRC_DIV_FLEX_VAL_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransOrderType
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractEO.ORDER_TYPE and xlvt.lookup_type = 'ORDER_TYPES')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransLocation
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractEO.LOCATION_CODE and xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_LOCATION_SEGMENT_SET')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSiteLocation
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalContractEO.SITE_LOCATION and xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_SITE_LOCATIONS' AND xlvt.application_id = 13)
